bwwExcerpt: Leading the cast as Edward Lewis is veteran Adam Pascal who played the original Roger Davis in Broadway's RENT. As a seasoned performer, he is a fitting match to the less experienced Olivia Valli who, as Vivian Ward, captures his heart with her naivety, infectious smile, and relentless grit. In RENT, Pascal has already proven himself a vocal genius and thankfully this musical gives him another opportunity to shine in that regard.
